title: The Judgement of Solomon
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on silk foundation with metal, wood, seed pearls, mica
Technique: embroidered in flat satin, stem, and back and knot stitches on seven and one satin foundation. Relief by a variety of looping, wrapping, and braiding and silk wrapped flexible coils.
description: Solomon enthroned with sage before him on left.  Two women with baby on ground and baby held up by sword-wielder on right.  Two castles in background, sun and clouds, tree with squirrel, lion, parakeet in tree, fishpond, other bird in tree, leopard in foreground.  Scattered floral and insect motifs overall.
name: Embroidered picture
